login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

hero.title: Smart Banking Without the Wait
hero.description: NASSAQ revolutionizes your banking experience with intelligent appointment management, real-time ATM tracking, and seamless digital services. Say goodbye to long queues and paper-based procedures.

coreServices.title: Three Core Services for Complete Banking Control
coreServices.subtitle: Experience banking designed around your schedule and needs

appointmentManagement.title: Appointment Management
appointmentManagement.description: Schedule your branch visits in advance. Choose your service type, preferred branch, and time slot to eliminate waiting.

atmTracking.title: ATM Status Tracking
atmTracking.description: Find nearby ATMs with real-time status updates on availability, cash levels, and maintenance schedules.

digitalTicketing.title: Digital Ticketing
digitalTicketing.description: Submit service requests online, upload documents, and track progress in real-time from submission to completion.

services.title: Comprehensive Banking Services
services.subtitle: From account management to corporate banking, we handle it all digitally

accountServices.title: Account Services
accountServices.description: Open accounts, activate cards, update information, and manage your banking profile

cardServices.title: Card Services
cardServices.description: Request new cards, report lost cards, adjust limits, and track all card-related requests

financingServices.title: Financing Services
financingServices.description: Get financing consultation, submit requests, upload documents, and track approval status

corporateBanking.title: Corporate Banking
corporateBanking.description: Letters of credit, guarantees, SWIFT transfers, and comprehensive corporate solutions

transferServices.title: Transfer Services
transferServices.description: International transfers, RTGS, ACH, and real-time transfer tracking and confirmations

digitalDocuments.title: Digital Documents
digitalDocuments.description: E-checks, e-signatures, Face ID verification, and completely paperless transactions

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Banking Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of customers who have already switched to smarter banking

footer.description: Intelligent banking application designed to organize customer time, facilitate communication, and provide a fully integrated digital banking experience.

appointments.appointmentDetails: Your appointment has been scheduled successfully
appointments.confirmationMessage: You will receive a confirmation notification shortly. Please arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled time.

services: Receive a card (Debit / Platinum / VIP / Partner)

services: Submit a Letter of Credit (LC) request

serviceSchedule.title: Service Schedule
serviceSchedule.description: Select a service to view available departments and their working hours
serviceSchedule.noDepartmentsAvailable: No departments or people available for this service. Please contact support.

myAppointments.noFavorites: No favorite departments or people yet. Click the star icon on any department or person to add them to your favorites.
myAppointments.submitAppointmentHint: Or submit an appointment request with an administrator to see it here.

tickets.submitRequest: Submit your service request with all required information and documents
tickets.addDescription: Add a detailed description of your request
tickets.dragDropFiles: Drag and drop files here, or click to select
tickets.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG (Max 10MB per file)
tickets.ticketSubmitted: Your support ticket has been submitted and is being reviewed
tickets.notifications: You will receive notifications as your ticket progresses through our departments. Average response time is 24-48 hours.
tickets.searchPlaceholder: Search tickets by ID, service, or category...
tickets.noTicketsFound: No tickets found. Submit your first feedback to get started.

card.label: Card Services
requests: Request a replacement for a lost card

actions.shareExperience: Share your experience or report any issues with this ATM

atm.noATMsFound: No ATMs found matching your search criteria

rewards.earnPointsBySubmittingFeedbackTickets: Earn points by submitting feedback tickets and unlock amazing rewards
rewards.title: Your Rewards
rewards.description: Earn points by submitting valuable feedback and unlock exclusive rewards!
rewards.pointsEarned: Points earned from accepted feedback tickets.

milestone500.title: 500 Points: Restaurant Discount
milestone500.description: Get a special discount voucher for a partner restaurant.
milestone500.congratulations: Congratulations! Your discount voucher has been sent to your registered email.

milestone1000.title: 1000 Points: Flight to Turkey Discount
milestone1000.description: Enjoy a discount on your next flight to Turkey.
milestone1000.congratulations: Amazing! Your flight discount code has been sent to your registered email.

howToEarnList.submitFeedback: Submit valuable feedback tickets through the "Support Tickets" section.
howToEarnList.earnPoints: Each accepted feedback ticket will earn you 20 reward points.
howToEarnList.unlockMilestones: Keep an eye on your points and unlock exciting milestones!

tickets.replyDescription: Send a reply to the customer who submitted this feedback

appointments.title: Appointment Management
appointments.viewAndManage: View and manage appointment requests submitted by users

appointments.assignAppointmentDescription: Assign this appointment request to the requested department administrator
appointments.viewAppointmentDetailsDescription: View complete information about the appointment request
